name: Snivy
flavorText: It is very intelligent and calm. Being exposed to lots of sunlight makes its movements swifter.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Tepig
flavorText: It blows fire through its nose. When it catches a cold, the fire becomes pitch-black smoke instead.
Attack1Text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Oshawott
flavorText: It fights using the scalchop on its stomach. In response to an attack, it retaliates immediately by slashing.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Reshiram
flavorText: This Pokemon appears in legends. It sends flames into the air from its tail, burning up everything around it.
Attack1Text: Does 10 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Discard 2 Fire Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Zekrom
flavorText: This Pokemon appears in legends. In its tail, it has a giant generator that creates electricity.
Attack1Text: Does 10 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This Pokemon does 40 damage to itself.

name: Snivy
flavorText: They photosynthesize by bathing their tails in sunlight. When they are not feeling well, their tails droop.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Tepig
flavorText: It can deftly dodge its foe's attacks while shooting fireballs from its nose. It roasts berries before it eats them.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Burned.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Oshawott
flavorText: The scalchop on its stomach is made from the same elements as claws. It detaches the scalchop for use as a blade.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Zoroark
flavorText: Each has the ability to fool a large group of people simultaneously. They protect their lair with illusory scenery.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokemon's attacks and use it as this attack.

name: Axew
flavorText: They use their tusks to crush the berries they eat. Repeated regrowth makes their tusks strong and sharp.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. If either of them is tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Pansage
flavorText: It shares the leaf on its head with weary-looking Pokemon. These leaves are know to relieve stress.
Attack1Text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Zorua
flavorText: To protect themselves from danger, they hide their true identities by transforming into people and Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

name: Minccino
flavorText: They greet one another by rubbing each other with their tails, which are always kept well groomed and clean.

name: Pansage
flavorText: It shares the leaf on its head with weary-looking Pokemon. These leaves are known to relieve stress.
Attack1Text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Pidove
flavorText: Each follows its Trainer's orders as best it can, but they sometimes fail to understand complicated commands.

name: Axew
flavorText: They use their tusks to crush the berries they eat. Repeated regrowth makes their tusks strong and sharp.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. If either of them is tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Ducklett
flavorText: When attacked, it uses its feathers to splash water, escaping under cover of the spray.

name: Darumaka
flavorText: When its internal fire is burning, it cannot calm down and it runs around. When the fire diminishes, it falls asleep.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Burned.

name: Zoroark
flavorText: Bonds between these Pokemon are very strong. It protects the safety of its pack by tricking its opponents.
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon is a Stage 2 Pokemon, this attack does 20 more damage.
Attack2Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokemon is reduced by 20 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Serperior
flavorText: They raise their heads to intimidate opponents but only give their all when fighting a powerful opponent.
Ability1Text: At any times between turns, heal 10 damage from each of your Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Move as many Grass Energy attached to your Pokemon to your other Pokemon in any way you like.

name: Emboar
flavorText: It can throw a fire punch by setting its fists on fire with its fiery chin. It cares deeply about its friends.
Ability1Text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a Fire Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokemon.

name: Samurott
flavorText: Part of the armor on its anterior legs becomes a giant sword. Its cry alone is enough to intimidate most enemies.
Ability1Text: Any damage done to this Pokemon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: Does 10 more damage for each Water Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Reshiram
flavorText: This Pokemon appears in legends. It sends flames into the air from its tail, burning up everything around it.
Attack1Text: Does 10 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Discard 2 Fire Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Zekrom
flavorText: This Pokemon appears in legends. In its tail, it has a giant generator that creates electricity.
Attack1Text: Does 10 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This Pokemon does 40 damage to itself.

name: Scraggy
flavorText: It immediately headbutts anyone that makes eye contact with it. Its skull is massively thick.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Axew
flavorText: They mark their territory by leaving gashes in trees with their tusks. If a tusk breaks, a new one grows in quickly.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Litwick
flavorText: Litwick shines a light that absorbs the life energy of people and Pokemon, which becomes the fuel that it burns.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokemon and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Victini
flavorText: This Pokemon brings victory. It is said that Trainers with Victini always win, regardless of the type of encounter.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn, after you flip any coins for an attack, you may ignore all effects of those coin flips and begin flipping those coins again. You can't use more than 1 Victory Star Ability each turn.
Attack1Text: Move all Energy attached to this Pokemon to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Riolu
flavorText: It has the peculiar power of being able to see emotions such as joy and rage in the form of waves.
Attack1Text: Switch this Pokemon with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Luxio
flavorText: Strong electricity courses through the tips of its sharp claws. A light scratch causes fainting in foes.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: This attack does 40 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Meowth
flavorText: It is nocturnal in nature. If it spots something shiny, its eyes glitter brightly.
Attack1Text: Heal 20 damage from this Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

name: Reshiram-EX
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this Pokemon does 50 damage to itself.

name: Kyurem-EX
Attack1Text: Discard a Special Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This Pokemon can't use Hail Blizzard during your next turn.

name: Zekrom-EX
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.
Attack2Text: Discard 2 Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Volcarona
flavorText: A sea of fire engulfs the surroundings of their battles, since they use their six wings to scatter their ember scales.
Ability1Text: Put 4 damage counters instead of 2 on your opponent's Burned Pokemon between turns.
Attack1Text: You may discard an Energy attached to this Pokemon. If you do, the Defending Pokemon is now Burned.

name: Thundurus
flavorText: The spikes on its tail discharge immense bolts of lightning. It flies around the Unova region firing off lightning bolts.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Lightning Energy card and attach it to this Pokemon. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Tornadus
flavorText: The lower half of its body is wrapped in a cloud of energy. It zooms through the sky at 200 mph.
Attack1Text: Move an Energy from 1 of your Benched Pokemon to this Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Move a basic Energy from this Pokemon to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Landorus
flavorText: Lands visited by Landorus grant such bountiful crops that it has been hailed as "The Guardian of the Fields."
Attack1Text: Attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage to each Benched Pokemon (both yours and your opponent's). (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Kyurem
flavorText: It generates powerful, freezing energy inside itself, but its body became frozen when the energy leaked out.
Attack1Text: Does 10 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This attack does 30 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Mewtwo-EX
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage times the amount of Energy attached to this Pokemon and the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Darkrai-EX
Ability1Text: Each of your Pokemon that has any Darkness Energy attached to it has no Retreat Cost.
Attack1Text: Does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Rayquaza-EX
Attack1Text: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. If any of those cards are Energy cards, attach them to this Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Discard all basic Fire Energy or all basic Lightning Energy attached to this Pokemon. This attack does 60 damage times the number of Energy you discarded.

name: Altaria
flavorText: If it bonds with a person, it will gently envelop the friend with its soft wings, then hum.
Ability1Text: Your Dragon Pokemon's attacks do 20 more damage to the Active Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Lilligant
flavorText: Even veteran Trainers face a challenge in getting its beautiful flower to bloom. This Pokemon is popular with celebrities.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Supporter card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Both this Pokemon and the Defending Pokemon are now Asleep.

name: Crobat
flavorText: Having four wings allows it to fly more quickly and quietly so it can sneak up on prey without its noticing.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may draw a card.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. Put 4 damage counters instead of 1 on that Pokemon between turns.

name: Lillipup
flavorText: It faces strong opponents with great courage. But, when at a disadvantage in a fight, this intelligent Pokemon flees.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

name: Flygon
flavorText: Known as "The Desert Spirit," this Pokemon hides in the sandstorms it causes by beating its wings.
Ability1Text: At any time between turns, if this Pokemon is your Active Pokemon, put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Pokemon.
Attack1Text: You may discard a Grass Energy and a Fighting Energy attached to this Pokemon. If you do, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Pikachu
flavorText: It occasionally uses an electric shock to recharge a fellow Pikachu that is in a weakened state.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

name: Elgyem
flavorText: It uses its strong psychic power to squeeze its opponent's brain, causing unendurable headaches.
Ability1Text: If this Pokemon has any Psychic Energy attached to it, this Pokemon has no Weakness.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Empoleon
flavorText: If anyone were to hurt its pride, it would slash them with wings that can cleave through an ice floe.
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: You may discard an Energy attached to this Pokemon. If you do, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Haxorus
flavorText: Their sturdy tusks will stay sharp even if used to cut steel beams. These Pokemon are covered in hard armor.
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to this Pokemon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 90 damage times the number of heads.

name: Black Kyurem
flavorText: This legendary ice Pokemon waits for a hero to fill in the missing parts of its body with truth or ideals.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: White Kyurem
flavorText: This legendary ice Pokemon waits for a hero to fill in the missing parts of its body with truth or ideals.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage.

name: Keldeo
flavorText: When it is resolute, its body fills with power and it becomes swifter. Its jumps are then too fast to follow.
Attack1Text: During your next turn, this Pokemon's Aqua Blade attack's base damage is 120.

name: Keldeo-EX
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokemon is on your Bench, you may switch this Pokemon with your Active Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Does 20 more damage for each Water Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Black Kyurem-EX
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: This Pokemon can't attack during your next turn.

name: White Kyurem-EX
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Discard 2 Fire Energy attached to this Pokemon. The Defending Pokemon is now Burned.

name: Drifblim
flavorText: At dusk, swarms of them are carried aloft on winds. When noticed, they suddenly vanish.
Attack1Text: Does 50 damage times the number of Special Energy cards in your opponent's discard pile.
Attack2Text: Put 4 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokemon.

name: Jigglypuff
flavorText: When it wavers its big, round eyes, it begins singing a lullaby that makes everyone drowsy.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Ninetales
flavorText: Its nine tails are said to be imbued with a mystic power. It can live for a thousand years.
Ability1Text: When you play this Pokemon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokemon, you may switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon with his or her Active Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Does 50 more damage for each Special Condition affecting the Defending Pokemon.

name: Ampharos
flavorText: The tip of its tail shines brightly. In the olden days, people sent signals using the tail's light.
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: You may discard all Lightning Energy attached to this Pokemon. If you do, this attack does 60 more damage.

name: Meloetta
flavorText: Its melodies are sung with a special vocalization method that can control the feelings of those who hear it.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Meloetta
flavorText: Many famous songs have been inspired by the melodies that Meloetta plays.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Virizion
flavorText: This Pokemon fought humans in order to protect its friends. Legends about it continue to be passed down.
Ability1Text: Each of this Pokemon's attacks does 50 more damage to Darkness Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Terrakion
flavorText: This Pokemon came to the defense of Pokemon that had lost their homes in a war among humans.
Ability1Text: Each of this Pokemon's attacks does 50 more damage to Darkness Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Cobalion
flavorText: This legendary Pokemon battled against humans to protect Pokemon. Its personality is calm and composed.
Ability1Text: Each of this Pokemon's attack does 50 more damage to Darkness Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Darkrai
flavorText: To protect itself, it afflicts those around it with nightmares. However, it means no harm.
Attack1Text: You may switch this Pokemon with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Giratina
flavorText: It was banished for its violence. It silently gazed upon the old world from the Distortion World.
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 50 more damage.
Attack2Text: Discard a random card from your opponent's hand.

name: Metagross
flavorText: With four linked brains, it's more intelligent than a supercomputer, and it uses calculations to analyze foes.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for a Team Plasma card, reveal it, and put it in your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. You may not use an Ability with the same name during your turn.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Electrode
flavorText: It is known to drift on winds if it is bloated to bursting with stored electricity.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: This Pokemon does 100 damage to itself.

name: Pikachu
flavorText: It occasionally uses an electric shock to recharge a fellow Pikachu that is in a weakened state.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Raichu
flavorText: Its tail discharges electricity into the ground, protecting it from getting shocked.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Landorus
flavorText: From the forces of lightning and wind, it creates energy to give nutrients to the soil and make the land abundant.
Attack1Text: If you have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent, this attack does 30 more damage.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Druddigon
flavorText: It runs through the narrow tunnels formed by Excadrill and Onix. It uses its sharp claws to catch prey.
Attack1Text: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon with the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: During your next turn, each of this Pokemon's attacks does 30 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Thundurus-EX
Attack1Text: Attach an Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Team Plasma Pokemon.
Attack2Text: If this Pokemon has any Plasma Energy attached to it, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Deoxys-EX
Ability1Text: Your Team Plasma Pokemon's attacks (excluding Deoxys-EX) do 10 more damage to the Active Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: If this Pokemon has any Plasma Energy attached to it, this attack does 30 more damage for each Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Lugia-EX
Ability1Text: If your opponent's Pokemon is Knocked Out by damage from an attack of this Pokemon, take 1 more Prize card.
Attack1Text: Discard a Plasma Energy attached to this Pokemon. If you can't discard a Plasma Energy, this attack does nothing.

name: Porygon-Z
flavorText: Its programming was modified to enable work in alien dimensions. It did not work as planned.
Ability1Text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Plasma Energy attached to 1 of your Pokemon to another of your Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

name: Lucario
flavorText: By reading the auras of all things, it can tell how others are feeling from over half a mile away.
Ability1Text: When you play this Pokemon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokemon, you may draw 2 cards.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Genesect
flavorText: This Pokemon existed 300 million years ago. Team Plasma altered it and attached a cannon to its back.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: During your next turn, this Pokemon's Overdrive Smash attack does 60 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Leafeon
flavorText: It basically does not fight. With cells similar to those of plants, it can perform photosynthesis.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.
Attack2Text: Attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Flareon
flavorText: Inhaled air is heated in the flame sac in its body to an intense fire over 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.
Attack2Text: You may discard a Fire Energy attached to this Pokemon. If you do, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Vaporeon
flavorText: Its cell composition is similar to water molecules. As a result, it can melt away into water.
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Heal 20 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Glaceon
flavorText: By controlling its body heat, it can freeze the atmosphere around it to make a diamond-dust flurry.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.
Attack2Text: Move an Energy from this Pokemon to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Jolteon
flavorText: If agitated, it uses electricity to straighten out its fur and launch it in small bunches.
Attack1Text: You may discard a Lightning Energy attached to this Pokemon. If you do, this attack does 40 more damage.
Attack2Text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.

name: Espeon
flavorText: Its fur is so sensitive, it can sense minute shifts in the air and predict the weather.
Ability1Text: Prevent all effects of your opponent's attacks, except damage, done to each of your Pokemon that has any Energy attached to it.
Attack1Text: Your opponent reveals his or her hand.

name: Umbreon
flavorText: When exposed to the moon's aura, the rings on its body glow faintly and it gains a mysterious power.
Attack1Text: Heal from this Pokemon the same amount of damage you did to the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This Pokemon can't use Slashing Strike during your next turn.

name: Eevee
evolvesTo: Vaporeon, Jolteon, Flareon, Sylveon, Espeon, Umbreon, Leafeon, Glaceon
flavorText: Thanks to its unstable genetic makeup, this special Pokemon conceals many different possible evolutions.
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokemon is reduced by 20 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

name: Tornadus-EX
Attack1Text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 30 more damage.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard an Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Eevee
evolvesTo: Vaporeon, Jolteon, Flareon, Sylveon, Espeon, Umbreon, Leafeon, Glaceon
flavorText: Thanks to its unstable genetic makeup, this special Pokemon conceals many different possible evolutions.
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokemon is reduced by 20 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

name: Mew
flavorText: Because it can use all kinds of moves, many scientists believe Mew to be the ancestor of Pokemon.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokemon is your Active Pokemon, you may have your opponent reveal his or her hand.
Attack1Text: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw 6 cards.

name: Genesect
flavorText: This Pokemon existed 300 million years ago. Team Plasma altered it and attached a cannon to its back.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Discard all Grass Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Genesect
flavorText: This Pokemon existed 300 million years ago. Team Plasma altered it and attached a cannon to its back.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Discard all Grass Energy attached to this Pokemon.
